metro.TrainManagement

Class TrainManagementService

  • java.lang.Object
    • metro.TrainManagement.TrainManagementService

  • public class TrainManagementService
extends java.lang.Object
    The train management service combines the former TrainOverseer and TrainLineOverseer into one class without any circle dependencies anymore. This service knows all Trains and all lines and is able to edit the lists and the train/line itself. You can add, remove or change these. There're no constants or any value belonging to a train or line, these are stored in the Train or Line class.
    Author:
    hauke

      • getTrains

      • addTrain

        public void addTrain(Train train)
        Adds a train to the list of bought trains. This method does not check for any valid trains (not null, etc.)!
        Parameters:
        train - The new train to add.

      • removeTrain

        public void removeTrain(java.lang.String trainName)
        Removes a train from the list of bought trains. This method does not check for any valid trains (not null, etc.)! This method will also add the price of the train to the players account.
        Parameters:
        trainName - The name of the train that should be removed.

      • getTemplateTrain

        public TrainTemplate getTemplateTrain(java.lang.String name)
        Gets a train template by giving its model name.
        Parameters:
        name - The model name of the train.
        Returns:
        A new train template object.

      • getTemplateTrains

        public java.util.ArrayList<TrainTemplate> getTemplateTrains()
        Returns:
        A list with all available trains. This does NOT mean that the player already bought them, they are just available for him.

      • addTemplateTrain

        public void addTemplateTrain(TrainTemplate train)
        Adds a template train to the list of them.
        Parameters:
        train - The template train that should be added.

      • getTrainByName

        public Train getTrainByName(java.lang.String trainName)
        Searches for a train with the given name. When there's no train with this name, this method will return null.
        Parameters:
        trainName - The name of the train.
        Returns:
        The train or null when this train doesn't exist.

      • sellTrainsFromLine

        public void sellTrainsFromLine(java.lang.String lineName)
        Removes all trains from the list of trains and adds the money to the players account.
        Parameters:
        lineName - The name of the trains that should be removed from the list.

        Parameters:

        Returns:

        Returns:
